mapper.select: select u.username, u.nickname, u.user_img, c.comm_id, c.product_id, c.product_name, c.order_item_id, c.user_id, c.is_anonymous, c.comm_type, c.comm_level, c.comm_content, c.comm_imgs, c.sepc_name, c.reply_status, c.reply_content, c.reply_time, c.is_show from product_comments c INNER JOIN users u ON u.user_id = c.user_id where c.product_id = #{productId};
